commit.message:
develop to master (#346)

* Stage 1 auth rewrite

* Auth rework

* Discord avatar

* Rewrites

* Fix 500 and avatar sql

* get revoke for later its minor

* Back to the roots

* Get highest access level during login

* Extra security

* Set and save accessLevel on login

* Example config

* Changable monolog output path

* Auto check discord access level every 5 minutes

* Rework frontend login

* Config vars

* Change discord avatar to png. Remove dev code. Autologout when accesslevel changes. Fix remove session data from db

* Sneak in safe icon update

* Sneak in safe icon update

* Facebook Oauth

* Remove unused facebook permission and ability to remove user data per request from facebook

* Example config and proper handling of

* Small typo fixes

* add facebook stuff to default.php

* Fix composer.json

* Update README.md

* Update README.md

* add `leaf storm` and `tri attack` to moves.json

* Force new Oauth

* Allow configurable accessRole level to be 0 value && Remove avatar from db on logout

* Potentially fix username issues

* Good first try on new force login screen

* Hide form fields based on config vars

* Push forgotten file

* Native login part 1

* Rebuild of native login

* Fix avatar

* Welcome email - change password button - store base64 avatar in session if db is empty

* Remove old user files

* Remove old manualAccess code

* Pick PR344

* PR343 changes but different

* PR341 changes but different

* Potential fix

* Potential fix hopefully

* Remove superseded

* dont need this anymore

* make profile modal look a bit better

* redo profile modal

* style language select

* fix password validation for native auth

* change password button styling

* disable button if passwords do not match anymore

* add login button for native

* Clear messages when something fails during login

* Report blacklisted discord server in error message

* config example fixes

* better native avatar

* fix weird form logic on raids

* Fix nginx and apache examples

* make discord url clickable in access denied thingy

* oops, oeps should be spelled as oops

* oeps, have to close the tag

* wtf am i doing

* nice. 5 commits on 1 line of code

* :see_no_evil:

* cleanup new files a bit

* make it all translatable

* fix typo

* Support everyone role discord

* remove $manualAccessLevel leftover

* remove more leftovers

* add mega assets

* add megas

* oops. more mega stuff

* untested

* Min/Max & Notify Mega

Added Option 6 for Min/Max Filter and the Notify filter

Also added the option into the manual quest section for future proofing

* Update pre-index.php

* fix clearStaleMarkers

* fix

* Mega Label

* Mega Icons and if else shortening

* fix raw data debug

* fix german typo

small german typo

* MAD

* proper mega egg/hatched images and compressed

* Adjust some defaults

* add $appIconPath (#350)

* add $appIconPath

* also in login.php

* fix indent

* WIP: mega energy reward support (untested)

* typo

* remove amounts for now

* typos

* allow mega rewards in query

* Mad filter fix

* add amount and mon name to popup

* missing comma in query

* started, mega energy, profile

* fix "number of bound variables does not match number of tokens" error

* fix pokestopMeetsQuestFilter

* make slider images work if not running in root

* rdm pr changed

* specify logout and native refresh (#373)

* specify logout and native refresh

* Thank you travis

* new mega reward icon logic

* mega energy search

* Update pre-index.php

* minor styling fix

* idk if it works on mad

* dont need this

* fix mad

* fix moving tab

* update de.json

* lint

* use PHP 7.4

* fix

* update fr.json

* i8ln fix

* lint

* Account sharing prevention 2.0 (#372)

* Account sharing prevention 2.0

* http reponse code 413 toastr

* Welcome back travis

* Optional login cookie and enhancements

* sql update file

* fix php warning

* Quick fix (#380)

* specify logout and native refresh

* Thank you travis

* Do not try to update DB when no user in session

* Thanks travis

* Sql update (#381)

* specify logout and native refresh

* Thank you travis

* Do not try to update DB when no user in session

* Thanks travis

* Vanished sql column
